channel.title: Kde Connect on Verummeum
channel.description: Recent content in Kde Connect on Verummeum

item.title: KDE Connect: Let Android and Linux devices communicate
item.description: Are you interested in receiving Android notifications on your Linux desktop or are you in need of an easy way to transfer data between Android and Linux devices? In this article we will take a look at KDE Connect, a free and open-source project that allows you to easily set up communication between Android and Linux devices.
